channel.title: Help With Sub-Menu
channel.description: If any of you could help me, I was wondering if there was a way when I hover over my kde icon that a sub menu could show up, or is this possible. Here is the website that im making [url=http://wiebelhausdesign.xtreemhost.com/kde/]http://wiebelhausdesign.xtreemhost.com/kde/[/url]

item.title: Help With Sub-Menu
item.dc:creator: @mwiebelhaus mwiebelhaus
item.description:
@mwiebelhaus wrote:

On another topic

Head over to runescape.com and steal their stolen css.

Found this in their css lmao…

/* ================================================================
This copyright notice must be untouched at all times.

The original version of this stylesheet and the associated (x)html
is available at http://www.cssplay.co.uk/menus/basic_dd.html
Copyright © 2005-2007 Stu Nicholls. All rights reserved.
This stylesheet and the assocaited (x)html may be modified in any
way to fit your requirements.
=================================================================== */

They should try spelling associated right.

Read full topic

item.title: Help With Sub-Menu
item.dc:creator: @RXVL RXVL
item.description:
@RXVL wrote:

[quote=“mwiebelhaus, post:5, topic:240595”][quote author=RXVL link=topic=316917.msg2515877#msg2515877 date=1225583809]
You can do it with CSS.
[/quote]

I was looking into guides showing me how to do it with css but I couldnt find anything that involved anything but text. If you have time can you show me?[/quote]

Sure. PM me some sauce to edit.

Read full topic

item.title: Help With Sub-Menu
item.dc:creator: @mwiebelhaus mwiebelhaus
item.description:
@mwiebelhaus wrote:

[quote=“Unhandled, post:2, topic:240595”]Yes, it is possible.
If you want to do it properly, you should look into a JavaScript library like jQuery.[/quote]

Do you think you can help me out with it. Im looking at and I’ll see if I can do it myself, but if you have some time that would be great.

Read full topic

item.title: Help With Sub-Menu
item.dc:creator: @Unhandled Unhandled
item.description:
@Unhandled wrote:

Yes, it is possible.
If you want to do it properly, you should look into a JavaScript library like jQuery.

Read full topic
